text: Masikin inchulâi hah a minchupu angin hong om rang hah a mulung a minchuk rang ani, tîrlâm khom a pu angin hong om rang hah a mulung achuk rang ani. In pumapa luo Beelzebul, tiin an koiin te, a in mingei vang chu khodôra riming saloi uolin mo an koi rang ni zoi!” 10:25: Mat 9:34; 12:24; Mk 3:22; Luk 11:15
